content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-22.5, 28.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-22.5, 23.5)
- Pipe connecting offshore pump to boiler at position (-23.5, 28.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to boiler connection
- Ensure that the boiler is properly connected to the offshore pump. Check the pipe connections and their statuses to confirm they are correctly linked and not empty.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target location.
